English: The private rooms are on the upper deck of the station.
Find the meeting room and talk to the GLaD spokesperson named Sectioner32
[c][80ffff]Really abort the mission? Please confirm![-][/c]\n\nYou can restart the mission via your PDA (F1) at any time.

[c][00ffff][GLaD] [-][/c]I have hacked into the station computers, not only for your landing permission, but to announce you as an inspector. You can go wherever you want. Use this to your advantage, but don't attract suspicion. 

Walk around for a while, talk to the [c][fbff00]Station Manager[-][/c]
Then find our contact at the [c][fbff00]Transport Manager[-][/c] desk.
Play your role as a station inspector
Play your role as a station inspector
Meet the GLaD contact person at the Transport Manager desk
Go to the station mining area and investigate
Follow the marker down to the mining area
This has been a strange conversation... without any coherence. Maybe a hidden code?
Ok, this seems to be the container. Let's look inside.
There is a pile of cloth and there is... really only a stick! \n\nThis is the [c][ffffff]Staff of Guidance[-][/c]?
Make your way to your vessel
[i][c][ff0000][Zirax Trooper][-][/c][c][ff8080] YOU over there! What are you doing here? Freeze![-][/c][/i]
Find answers in the guts of the planet remnant asteroid

The same station we just escaped from... just a little bit more menacing. 
Let's see if the Staff of Guidance will lead us through this.

We'll [c][ffff80]land on the lower pad[-][/c] this time,
next to the perimeter beacon.
Land on the lower landing pad
I suggest we start up in the control room. \n\nHopefully there are some data notes we can access, IDA?
Proceed up to the control room
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] An access terminal should be somewhere on the upper levels.
Find the terminal on the upper level
Find a way down to the mine shaft

So .. the Zirax and the Talon share some history?
And the proof is hidden down below in this asteroid?

Ok... [c][ffff00]downstairs [-][/c]again.
Go to the mine shaft entrance
Oh, how convenient. Someone has put some [c][ffff80]lights to mark the way[-][/c]. \n\nFollow the red string, down into the abyss.
A subterranean facility? \n\nWhat are these Zirax and creatures doing down here?
Definitely not a military compound. \n\nSome sort of a ... temple? An ancient worshiping place?
[c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]I am reading extremely high energy fluctuations ... and ... someone is trying to access my databases!\n\n The info I managed to decode has some ... interesting implications.

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] The information we got indicates this is part of an ancient station ... of the so-called  [c][ffffff]Talon-Zirax Assembly[-][/c]!\n  \nWhat lies in front of you seems to be one of the sections with the AI core and some databases.
Activate the AI and gather all available data
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] I am receiving a data stream with blueprints of the weapon described on the panel!
[c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]I am receiving a secondary data stream. \n\nAgain, all construction details of the weapon described on the panel!
IDA? I have a strong feeling that this information might change everyone's understanding of what happens here in Andromeda.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Indeed. I'm already analyzing the text on the displays.\n\nWe should [c][fbff00]head back to Sectioner32[-][/c] and deliver these weapon schematics.
Go to Polaris Asteroid Mining Station
Go to Polaris Asteroid Mining Station. The station can be found in the [c][fbff00]asteroid belt[-][/c] in this system!
IDA .. I have a feeling that we are not in this galaxy by any accident.
Defeat an alien faction base by destroying the core! Notice: You must use projectile weapons to destroy its core - you cannot use explosives (e.g. rocket launcher, explosive device, etc)
Preparing an Assault means preparing the Basics. And the Basics are run by ores. Prepare your team and let's go!
Mine 1000 Promethium Ore. Buying from a marketplace or just having it in your inventory does not complete this Mission!
Mine 1000 Magnesium Ore. Buying from a marketplace or just having it in your inventory does not complete this Mission!
Mine 1000 Cobalt Ore. Buying from a marketplace or just having it in your inventory does not complete this Mission!
Mine 500 Sathium Ore. Buying from a marketplace or just having it in your inventory does not complete this Mission!
Mine Neodymium Ore. Buying from a marketplace or just having it in your inventory does not complete this Mission!
Your team's battleships will need a lot of fuel for flying around and maybe a few Pentaxid warp crystals for traveling to other planets. Now it is the time to refuel and restock!
Craft 1000 Large Fuel Packs. You'll need to mine or acquire 2500 Promethium Ore.
Craft 100 Pentaxid. You'll need to mine or acquire 100 Pentaxid (raw material).
Get prepared for Bullets and Bites! Your team should always carry a few essential medics for use in bad situations in their backpacks.
For more Info about Status Effects, diseases and how to cure them, please read the DOCTOR'S JOURNAL in the Empyriopedia (F1)

Your group got all its Ammo and Medicals - but what if the battle takes longer than expected? Having some durable, less-perishable food and emergency oxygen in your backpack may decide about failure or success earlier than you might expect!
Cook 5x Canned Meat in the Food Processor.
Cook 5x Canned Vegetables in the Food Processor.
Is your Group well prepared? Then go ahead and raid some well defended Bases of the Alien factions! Can you keep up with them?

The TITAN wreckage is located on the SNOW planet in the starter system. \nYou need a WARP-capable vessel (Small Vessel + Warpdrive + Pentaxid Tank + Pentaxid fuel).\nYour vessel should have weapons and turrets.
It seems the Titan has broken into several parts...
Approach the COM ARRAY. Make sure to clear the area before going inside.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Get us close to a [c][ffff00]station console[-][/c] so I can have a look in their database.
Go inside and approach the marked console.
There is another teleporter in this station. You need to find it. Look for a GREEN room and signs that indicate authorized access only.
The Mainframe is hovering over ground. The teleporter brings you back to the Radar Station entry room. From there you can teleport back to the COM Station.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Seems like that station has taken a beating already. \n\nLocate the [c][ffff00]main access switch and pull it[-][/c] to release the info.
Find the lever and pull it to release the blocked message.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] I am receiving a weak UCH positioning signal. \n\nI'll add a [c][fbff00]marker [-][/c]to your radar and hud.
[c][00ffff]Really abort the mission? Please confirm![-][/c]\n[c][80ffff][-][/c]You can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
Find and access the console on the bridge. \nCheck the containers for valuable loot.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] You should make a [c][fbff00]fly-by on all three parts[-][/c] for a better scan result.\n\n[c][fbff00]150m[-][/c] should be enough.
I am afraid we can't expect the Zirax to have left anything for us to find.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  There are some ... secret technical details of the construction they might have not found.
Is there possibly  more you can tell me?
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Sure.. I am.. wait..Commander, I do not .. there is a .. please wait .. a signal .. has activated a ..
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  .. failed .. wave .. protocol .. black .. find override code .. console!
[c][00ffff]< Integrated Data Assistant .. remote access detected >[-][/c]
... finding a [c][ffff00]code[-][/c] in a [c][ffff00]maintenance console[-][/c] in a wreckage, after more than a year of the enemy tearing it apart ...
This whole expedition is absolutely doomed ...

Find the maintenance console (colored yellow/orange) in the center of the front part of the TITAN wreckage!\n\nNote: You can re-read the logs by facing the maintenance console and pressing F AND in the Empyriopedia/Journeybook!

There are two token consoles in each wreckage. The position is marked on your hud. 
Go closer to 2m to proceed with the mission.

Note: You can re-read the logs by facing the maintenance console and pressing F AND in the Empyriopedia/Journeybook!
The command console is marked on our hud.\n\nNote: You can re-read the logs by facing the maintenance console and pressing F AND in the Empyriopedia/Journeybook!
So, of course these codes are distributed over the Titan. \n[c][ffff00][-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]One in each wreckage[-][/c] no doubt.
The teleporter is located up the elevator. Use it to proceed with the mission.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  You need to find the [c][fbff00]core room[-][/c]. Any info should be stored there!

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  The station computer had some interesting info. The Radar Site is heavily defended, but there is a teleporter set up as a side entrance in one of the perimeter stations ... RIGHT HERE!  \n[c][fbff00][-][/c]\n[c][fbff00]Find the teleporter and use it![-][/c]
Pull the lever on the wall in the Core room.

[b][c][00ffff]Chapter 4: A Glacial Grave[-][/c][/b]

Good news is always the best news!
Enjoy the party, but don't wait for too long.

It is about time for a [c][ffffff]trip to the snow planet[-][/c], to [c][ffffff]find the wreckage of the TITAN[-][/c] and stir up some icy dust 
[i][/i]
[i]Location: Snow Planet; Ellyon System (Starter System)[/i]

There are two token consoles in each wreckage. The position is marked on your hud. 
Go closer to 2m to proceed with the mission.

Note: You can re-read the logs by facing the maintenance console and pressing F AND in the Empyriopedia/Journeybook!

There are two token consoles in each wreckage. The position is marked on your hud. 
Go closer to 2m to proceed with the mission.

Note: You can re-read the logs by facing the maintenance console and pressing F AND in the Empyriopedia/Journeybook!
Go closer than 150m towards the FRONT part of the wreckage.
Go closer than 150m towards the MIDDLE part of the wreckage.
Go closer than 150m towards the REAR part of the wreckage.

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  This returned perfect results.  You should now go to the [c][fbff00]front part[-][/c] and land nearby.\n\nI have [c][fbff00]marked [-][/c]an easy [c][fbff00]entry point[-][/c].
Find a way inside the FRONT part of the wreckage. Follow the yellow marker, IDA has set for you.\n\n[c][ff0000]Do NOT deconstruct or destroy ANY console! This might break the mission.[-][/c]
Fly to the distillery. It is located in the same orbit as the trading station. Follow the yellow marker.
The bartender is located next to the dancefloor.
Manager Slick can be found on top of the club in his office. \nYou can go there from the outside or from the inside of the club.
The Inferno Club is in the same orbit as the distillery. Follow the yellow marker on your hud.
Speak to Lark and get your gratification.
Head back to the office and wait.
Speak to the rootmaster. He is working in the production room on the other side of Lark's office.
Speak to brewmaster Lark in the distillery again.

You either can kill all pirates, loot the corpses and the base to find the recipe .. or simply talk them into a trade! \nYou might need to be at NEUTRAL reputation with the Pirates Clan for the latter to be an option, though.
The pirate base is marked on your hud. It is in the same orbit than the trading station and the distillery
Targets that count towards the mission: Any drone
Targets that count towards the mission goal: Any drone any Zirax trooper (Patrol and in POIs) Zirax Ripper Dogs Zirax Traders Mechanoids and Turret Robots Armored Golem
Emergency broadcast systems activated.\n\nEnemy troops inbound! ETA about 30 seconds!
Prepare for the battle.  Use your small vessel or capital vessel if available. Bombers are hard to shoot down with hand weapons!
Survive until IDA has sent the broadcast.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  The antennas are adjusted. Sending. Now!
Survive until IDA has tracked the location where the reply message was blocked.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Commander! We just lost the antennas! \n\nThe signal was sent, but the reply seems to have been intercepted!
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Yes. \n\nI have [c][fbff00]marked the location[-][/c] on your map and on your radar.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Commander! I am receiving the reply signal!

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Just one sentence:

GLaD you are here! ;) 
-Alex
Holy.. oh my god .. that is .. Alex!
[c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]Commander. Someone has started a  self destruct! \n\nHead [c][fbff00]back to the teleporter[-][/c]. QUICK!
Head back to the teleporter. You are not in danger when you make it in time to the platform. Enjoy the explosion.
I can't believe it. They are alive! Alex too! Thank god!
Although ... no coordinates. No flight vector.
At least the GRAND and most of the fleet survived this ambush.  They are probably safe, because the Zirax don't know where they went.
With any luck, our actions just now didn't accidentally reveal that location to them either.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  A good end, although a dead end, Commander.
I have a good feeling about this.
And now, let's get the hell out of here.
The Teleporter brings you back to the entry room in the Radar Station. Use the teleporter in the Radar Station to get back to the COM STATION.
..this seems more like a storage room .. but looks like this [c][ffff00]lever on the wall [-][/c]is what we came for!

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Commander, seems like the data is stored in a remote location. 
That Mainframe seems to be connected to this location via another teleporter.

We need to [c][fbff00]find that other teleporter[-][/c] and use it.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c]  Energy fluctuation!\n\nTeleport back to the Radar Station!
Go to the Sky Guys bar and buy a beer.

[b][c][00ffff]Chapter 5: Ancient Revelations[-][/c][/b]

An ancient threat, hibernating for centuries, seems to have started to rise its ugly head again and is asking for your attention.

Follow its trace and find the [c][ffffff]destroyed small vessel[-][/c] in the[c][ffffff] orbit of the BARREN planet[-][/c] in [u]this system[/u].

[i]Location: Barren Planet Orbit; Ellyon System (Starter System)[/i]

Why do they brew their beer in a distillery...? Sounds wrong.
Either way.
  [c][00ffff][-][/c]
Let's [c][fbff00]find the Brewmaster[-][/c].
Speak to the brewmaster. Lark is standing on the 1st floor in the office building.

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] This appears to be the pirate base, Commander.  \n\nSomeone inside should know where we can find the recipe .. or might want to hand it over with the use of appropriate arguments.
More like a SPACE inferno .. club .. or something.
You would expect to at least get some refreshments in a distillery, right? .. Hmpf ..
Brewing root beer in Andromeda seems to be a very involved process...
Take THIS! I win! You lose!\n\nHmm ... my beer should be ready in the meantime.
Investigate the interiors of the station. Check and activate consoles to find out what is going on.
Enter the control station in the center of the minefield.

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] A short-range teleport!  Consult your map to see if our vessel is within short-range travel distance. \n\n[c][ffffff]Bringing our vessel over here will allow for a mobile base in the event of unexpected consequences.[-][/c]
Find the entrance to the Ilmarinen.
Search through the Ilmarinen and find the Core room. \nFollow the hints on displays and projectors!
Approach the small vessel to scan it.
At least we found the vessel.\n\nAnd we found the reason why the signal was lost all of a sudden.

You can go back and forth with the teleporters on the station and in the vessel. The control station has a medbay you can USE and RESPAWN in.\n\nAdvice: In case you have a capital vessel with a medbay or clone chamber, bring it to the Ilmarinen in case you die and need to recover.
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Energy spikes detected! \n\nLarge masses teleporting in!
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] I am picking up hostile signals. \n\nWe should leave immediately!

[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Commander! I managed to decode the hints the Shift Manager gave us.  I think I found the [c][fbff00]Planetary Remnant[-][/c]. \n\nI have added a [c][fbff00]marker [-][/c]on your HUD!
I am more concerned about the signs we just passed and not about that terminal, to be honest..
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Some of the data nodes and calculations indicate you might be correct about that.
[c][00ffff]Really abort the mission? Please confirm![-][/c]\n\nYou can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
[c][80ffff]Really abort the mission? Please confirm![-][/c]\n\nYou can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
This seems to be the station where we were said to meet Sectioner32.

[c][00ffff]Chapter 6: Uncertain Outcomes[-][/c]

The GLaD has invited you to meet them! Find a civilian [c][ffffff]Waystation[-][/c] in the orbit of one of the gas giants' moons in this system (Ellyon system)  

Your suit AI will be able to decode the exact meeting coordinates as soon as you approach one of the stations.

[i]Location: Gas Giant Moon Orbits; Ellyon System (Starter System)[/i]
[i]Reputation: Requires at least a [c][ffffff]neutral [-][/c]standing with [c][ffffff]Free Colonists[-][/c][/i] and[i][c][ffffff] Polaris Megacorp[-][/c][/i]
These structures do not look like anything we have seen before.
[c][c0c0c0][i].. those who plan to ascend ..[/i]\n[i].. listen to our warning ..[/i]\n[i].. listen to your progenitors .. [/i][-][/c]
Sit down on a chair or bench.
Here we go. What did Kezzel say? \n\nGo to the [c][ffffff]Sky Guys[-][/c] bar, get a [c][ffffff]beer [-][/c]and [c][ffffff]sit down[-][/c]?
Here we are.\n\nThis will probably take a while to find the TITAN ...
[c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Reduce speed! Several energy signatures detected. Active signatures.\n\nA minefield!

Praise the Emperor, stranger! 

Some of our lieutenants have told me you had helped them in various situations. Now you can prove your worth for the Zirax Empire!

Get out there and [c][fff000]kill some of those worthless creatures[-][/c] crouching and running around and do not care for anything. 

I am sick of looking at them. 
Prey .. pfff.
The ZIRAX generously take note of your dedication to the Empire.

A recently seized cargo transport led us to the assumption that the POLARIS are harvesting Pentaxid Crystals in certain areas of this planet - without permission!

If I would not know their obvious profit plans any better, I would have guessed they are searching for something particular.

 We want you to follow this trace, closely investigate and [c][fff000]bring back some of the Pentaxid Crystals[-][/c] so we can get an idea why these areas are of such an importance to them!
The ZIRAX generously take note of your dedication to the Empire.

Every week the same troubles!

One of our patrols accidentally shot down a representative of one of the other Zirax houses. Is this MY fault if their worthless officers do not sign the trespassing formulas? Exactly! 

Can you please grab a weapon and [c][ffff00]silence this turmoil [-][/c]at the Crash Site?
The ZIRAX generously take note of your dedication to the Empire.
Hm. Nobody out here. This is a trap? Yes, of course...

These pesky Talon! Now they have gone too far. 

I do not know how, but they destroyed several of our base generators and fuel tanks! The governor wants to set a warning example. 

Search for their settlements and bazaars and kill their Chiefs, Guards, their Sentinels and Traders and destroy the statues they pray towards. 

No mercy!
The ZIRAX generously take note of your dedication to the Empire.

Ha! Now we got them with their dirty company hands deep into illegal transactions! 

A scout team has caught a POLARIS team selling medicals, building material and other commodities to the Talon. We are sure, they are also selling them weapons, so we NEED to act now! Zirax High Court has ordered the clearing of the POLARIS Trading compound by weapon fire. 

Go there and prove your loyalty to the Empire. No survivors.
The ZIRAX generously take note of your dedication to the Empire.

Greetings from the Polaris Megacorp, my dear friend!

You look like someone that has grown to like some...privacy.
We, as a company, are the biggest advocates of privacy - but we are afraid the Zirax Empire does not really value this like we do. 

Do you think you can [c][fff000]shut down some of their drones[-][/c] ... just for the sake of the wildlife and its unimpaired living, of course?
The POLARIS Board of Directors gratefully appreciates your formidable services.

Wonderful performance in your last mission! 

But we are afraid we need to invest more time in the well-being of the creatures of this planet - especially around ore deposits. Some minerals seem to affect the wildlife and we do not have prospectors .. I mean, skilled explorers at hand.

Your bearing shows you are a skilled explorer. 

So may we ask you for another favor and [c][fff000]scout a few ore deposits[-][/c] - only for checking the living conditions of the native animals, of course.
The POLARIS Board of Directors gratefully appreciates your formidable services.

Currently, our biggest concern on this planet are the sources of Promethium. 

The promethium stones and deposits in that area seem to interact with the ecosystem, leading to wildlife attacks targeting our worke ... the more precious lifeforms there. 

We would like to ask you to venture in such an area, check what is happening there and [c][fff000]bring back a few samples of promethium[-][/c] so we can make profit .. examine it!
The POLARIS Board of Directors gratefully appreciates your formidable services.

What a shame! 

It seems the Zirax do not value our combined efforts to improve our companies ... the planets ... situation and have sent in an attack force to one of our facilities. 

On behalf of the POLARIS Board of Directors, we ask you to head there and [c][ffff00]help with the defenses[-][/c]!
The POLARIS Board of Directors gratefully appreciates your formidable services.
Are these POLARIS guys trying to fool me with their 'caring about the environment' drivel?

The Zirax have gone too far once again and are posing a risk to our company operations !
I mean, primarily to the natives, of course! 

We need to help them get back on the right track, don't you think? 
First, we should 'inform' some of their personnel and deliver a loud and clear warning. 

Do you mind delivering that little notice to the recipients, will you?
The POLARIS Board of Directors gratefully appreciates your formidable services.
Targets that count towards the mission goal: Any drone Any Zirax trooper (Patrol and in POIs) Zirax Ripper Dogs Zirax Traders Mechanoids and Turret Robots Armored Golem

Do you believe that! 

The Zirax not only seem to disagree with our company operations, but also store dangerous substances in 3rd party non-licensed containers? That's something we simply cannot accept!

Can you possibly stop by a Zirax facility and check if the storage areas are up to our high company standards? 

You are entitled to seize any goods stored in a non-compliant fashion.  Additionally, you may advise the personnel to exit, or abandon their facility.
The POLARIS Board of Directors gratefully appreciates your formidable services.
The ZIRAX generously take note of your dedication to the Empire.

These POLARIS tricksters think we let them do whatever they want. 

Even the local governor believes in their 'environmental first' campaign nonsense, while they ruthlessly exploit any deposit they can get their hands on. You will help us to reveal their real interests! 
[c][fff000][-][/c]
[c][fff000]Locate and investigate one of their Hubs or Trading Stations.[-][/c] 

I am quite sure they even work with those Talon scumbags.

The following creatures have been identified as The Legacy: 
GolemSwamp
Overseer
TotalHorror
I can already feel them coming...

Our attempts to halt the spread of the unholy seems to have triggered a reaction. 

Our Elders feel that our villages will soon be under attack. 

Will you help us to [c][fff000]defend our settlements [-][/c]against the unholy creatures?
The Talon community gratefully gives thanks to you for your deeds.
The Talon community gratefully gives thanks to you for your deeds.
The world is filled with places where the unholy is hiding from our eyes. \n\nWe can feel it - will you help us to [c][fbff00]find [-][/c]some of its hiding places?
The Talon community gratefully gives thanks to you for your deeds.

The radiated zones are a source of power for the unholy. \n\nWill you help us stop their spread by [c][fff000]harvesting some wood[-][/c] so we can better equip our warriors and fortify our settlements?

Targets that count towards the mission: 
AlienBug (any) 
CaveWorm (any) 
Creepy 
Otyugh 
Oviraptor 
Raptor (any) 
Spider (any) 
Spinosaurus 
Telluropod
Predators are roaming our territory, frightening our children and attacking our workers. \n\nWill you take care of this threat and [c][fff000]fend of the predators[-][/c]?
The Talon community gratefully gives thanks to you for your deeds.

Killing only the troopers does not seem to make them listen. 

We need to shut down what fuels their bases. 

Would you mind assisting us in some sabot... er, ahem, in demonstrating our determination and [c][fff000]shut down some of their generators or fuel tanks[-][/c]?

The Zirax have oppressed us long enough! 

But we do not want to directly assault them. Instead, we would like to express...our arguments. 

Will you lend us a hand in our campaign and [c][fff000]deliver our message[-][/c] to some of their troops?

[b][c][00ffff]Chapter 3: Totally Overpowered[-][/c][/b]

Make yourself comfortable in the [c][ffffff]Sky Guys bar[-][/c] at your STARTER planets [c][ffffff]orbital trading station[-][/c].

[c][ffffff]Get yourself a[-][/c] totally awesome [c][ffffff]root beer[-][/c], [c][ffffff]sit down[-][/c] and enjoy the view while relaxing from from the stresses of your most recent adventures. 

The wheel of fortune says: someone will call you soon.
[i][/i]

Story Chapter 7: [c][00ffff][b]Meet the GLaD[/b][-][/c]

Looking back at your time in Andromeda, you feel like you've been stumbling from one event to another, making friends and foes as you go but without being aware of the bigger picture. Your gut feel is that there must be something that explains all this. Even after showing  your new allies the information about the Talon, Zirax and Legacy having a shared history, things are not getting any better.

You are still in doubt as to the motives of the Galactic Liberation and Defense organisation. Your partner, Alex, might be part of this group and you understand they support a Talon rebellion against the Zirax Empire. However, most of this does not make any sense to you yet.

But things are about to change...

Hello Friend! 

We just wanted to let you know that we have received all the information you recently found about the Talon-Zirax Assembly and the War of Silence. Things are starting to make sense, although the information is extremely fragmented. Our analysts will need some time to put things in the correct context of the big picture. At least the parts we know about.

That being said .. we think it is time we meet in person. We owe you some answers.

Find the [c][ffff00]Sigma Zero[-][/c] system, situated in the area between Zirax, Traders Guild and Polaris territories.  
Fly to the [c][ffff00]asteroid field [-][/c]in that sector. We'll send you our location when you arrive there.

Sincerely,
Sectioner5

Activate the TERRITORIES checkbox in the galaxy map ([c][00ff00]M[-][/c]) and find the [c][ffff00]Sigma Zero[-][/c] system, situated in between the area between Zirax, Traders Guild and Polaris territories.
Commander, we are getting new coordinates. \n\nI have [c][ffff00]marked [-][/c]the position on screen.
\nFly to the [c][ffff00]asteroid field [-][/c]in the Sigma Zero system. GLaD will send you the exact location when you arrive.
Commander, we are advised to park our ship and enter the base through the [c][ffff00]Entrance[-][/c] door behind the corridor on the upper platform.
Enter the base. The entrance door is located at the end of the corridor on the upper platform
We are advised to see the Commander in the upper control room.
Enter the base and speak to the commander in the upper control room of the base
Emmerson is in the bar on the middle deck

Story Chapter 8: [c][00ffff]Sigma Fulcrum[-][/c]

You have finally made contact with what remains of the UCH . Those that did not want to join Vice Admiral Perez have founded Galactic Liberation and Defense (GLaD). Your partner Commander Alex Lamarr and Captain Jennifer Zerogen were integral in its creation. 

Thanks to information you provided, the GLaD were able to piece together a vague outline of what is happening in Andromeda - but there is still much we do not know.

In the meantime, the GLaD requests your assistance once again..
Commander, please let us [c][ffff00]meet [-][/c]in the [c][ffff00]command room[-][/c]\n We have in need of your skills with a delicate problem we are facing...
The Central Operations area is where you met Mercer Junior for the first time.
Find the [c][ffff00]CPU_Console[-][/c] so Yarod can upload himself to the station core. You need to be within 4m.
[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] Perfect. Uploading started. [c][ffff00]I need a few seconds[-][/c]. Stay low.
Yarod needs a few seconds to upload himself to the station core.
Fly back to the GLaD Outpost in the nearby asteroid field.
Speak to the traders in the trading room at the main entrance.
Yarod was last seen in the lower level of the station. He is probably hiding!
Sigma Fulcrum is in the same system. Warp to the [c][ffff00]STATION symbol[-][/c] on the system map ([c][00ff00]M[-][/c])
Very nice. Let's [c][ffff00]check out[-][/c] the [c][ffff00]traders and ask around[-][/c]. \nBest place for information on these stations.
We should watch out while searching for Yarod. \n\nSome of those guys don't look too friendly. We don't want to be shot in the back.
[[c][80ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] Well done. This was very convincing. Now let's find an [c][ffff00]Access Point.[-][/c]
The commander can be found in the main command center.
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] Interesting. The data from Sigma Fulcrum would have sent us to this system as well. Yarod and I do not think this is pure coincidence..

The system is close to the GLaD base in a direct line from there just a few clicks into the Zirax territory.
Look for a solar system with the marker '[c][ffff00]Mining Operation[-][/c]'. Find the [c][ffff00]asteroid field[-][/c] inside the system.

You need to bring the [c][00ffff]STAFF OF GUIDANCE[-][/c] with you in your inventory!

[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] We are receiving coordinates of a vessel nearby and advised to hold fire on approach. \nThe message is signed by Ambassador  Hyzani from the House of Abyssal of the Zirax Empire!
Do not fire on the vessel!
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] They are asking us to bring our ship along their starboard side. There is an entrance on the aft.
[[c][00ffff]Unknown[-][/c]] Welcome to the abyssal science vessel 'Her Majesty Herschel' . \nYou will find the [c][ffff00]ambassador on the bridge[-][/c]. Please, Do not touch anything!
Warp to the [c][00ffff]temperate [-][/c]planet in this system.

[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] Do I need to point out the fact that this lady is aware of our activities here and she knew exactly where to find us and the GLaD? Just saying...\n\n[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] She is part of the House of Abyssal. Intelligence reports suggest there is growing unrest in the Empire
Follow the yellow marker after entering the planet.
Check the boxes and cargo containers in the rooms for Technical Artifacts and Mutated Substance

[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] Commander, this technical artifact fragment is similar to the one I came in touch with previously. Also, this room is permeated with an inert form of Essence of the VOID. It is encased in this [c][ffff00]Mutated Substance[-][/c] and stored in this container! We should [c][ffff00]take both with us[-][/c]
Bring the artifact and the mutated substance to the ambassador
Find the archive in the orbit of the Desert Burnt world
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] I am scanning a few Pirate vessels and Zirax in that sector. Not many, but we should be cautious.
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] There is a [c][ffff00]boarding ramp at the back[-][/c] of a docked vessel. This would make a good entry point!
Board ship and make your way through the asteroid.

The keeper can be found in one of the archive rooms. You might need to find a way inside. Check the [c][ffff00]docked vessel[-][/c] and all the [c][ffff00]caverns [-][/c]for [c][ffff00]notes [-][/c]and [c][ffff00]levers. [-][/c]They might include hints on how to get inside!
Let's see if we learn anything valuable from this archive.

[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]]  We are getting company! Counting [c][ffff00]10 [-][/c]enemy signatures.\n\nYou need to find the [c][ffff00]enemies [-][/c]in the archive rooms and[c][ffff00] kill them[-][/c] before they can destroy the archive!
There are 10 enemies spawned in the archive, but not outside! Find them and kill them.
[[c][00ffff]Keeper[-][/c]] Download completed. This archive is now shutting down. Thanks for your visit. Farewell, Keeper of the Staff!
Fly back to the ship of the ambassador in the asteroid field of the system and talk to her.

Story Chapter 9: [c][00ffff]Unexpected Allies[-][/c]

You found Yarod, a former station AI that got in touch with a VOID artifact, which seems to have allowed him to develop his own personality. He has integrated himself into your suit and is now supporting IDA and you on your missions. He asked you to not reveal  him to the GLaD or any other organization. He might have a reason for this. And you possibly too.

You still do not entirely trust that organization called GLaD. Even the UCH itself has become a bit suspicious to you, based on what you learned from the TITAN logs -  but your recent endeavors also didn't bring you any closer to Alex or an answer that would explain what is happening.

So you have no other choice as to smile and try to stay in the game - which leads to finding an unexpected ally..
[c][00ffff][-][/c]

[b]Story Chapter 10: [c][00ffff]Wins and Losses[-][/c][/b]

Something unexpected happened: you found an ally within the Zirax Empire. The ambassador Hyzani of the House of Abyssal not only helped you to understand more about what makes the Zirax Empire tick, but also seems to know a lot about the events of the recent past. Especially about the LEGACY. And also about a mysterious, presumably extinct race named the PROGENITOR. 

While you still try to fiddle out how the new information fits into the big picture, including the VOID and the TESCH, you are racing back to the GLaD outpost to reveal a possible traitor and save the crew from an already rolling Ghyst assault on the base.
Fly back to the GLaD outpost - and do not waste time!
Hello Commander! \nI have a note for you: [c][ffff00]Ensign Henrid[-][/c] wants to speak to you. \nHe can be found upstairs in the Crew Quarters.
Use the elevator behind the door to the left of the bartender. It leads up to the crew quarters, sleeping and bathrooms.
Sergeant Palant can be found in the loading dock on the lower level of the base.
[[c][00ffff]Palant[-][/c]] Commander, I am measuring an increase in the particle density. Please - you have the only fully closed suit - reactivate the seals whatever it costs.
[[c][00ffff]Palant[-][/c]] Commander, our communication array has just exploded!

Ah .. the sound of treason!

Palant! Gather the crew and get out of here. We are under attack! 
I'll [c][ffff00]go upstairs, [-][/c]find [c][ffff00]Mercer [-][/c]and cover your back.
[i][[c][00ffff]other side of locked door[-][/c]] .. and you'll probably survive, Commander Mercer![/i]
Have a seat in your cockpit and send the code
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] Sir, we did not get sent any coordinates and it seems all the vessels are already gone.  And now all the traces of a possible traitor are also eradicated..
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]]  Message incoming. It is from ambassador Hyzani!

The system is marked on your map with '[c][fbff00]High Security[-][/c]': Find the spot where the Zirax and Kriel territory nearly touch. A few clicks behind the Zirax border, there should be the system.  Go there and warp to the local '[c][eeff00]Asteroid Field[-][/c]'

[[c][00ffff]Hyzani[-][/c]] To distract the troops from the prison, we should [c][eeff00]destroy 2 stations[-][/c] of the [c][eeff00]Ghyst[-][/c]. Search for  their bases or defense stations and destroy their station [c][ffff00]cores[-][/c].

Fly to any planet orbit and [c][eeff00]destroy 2 stations[-][/c] of the [c][eeff00]Ghyst[-][/c]. If you do not find any, search in the nearby star systems. \n[c][eeff00]Destroy their cores[-][/c] to complete the task. Vessels will work as well.

[[c][00ffff]Hyzani[-][/c]] Well done. We should have distracted them enough for now. Fly [c][ffff00]to the prison[-][/c]. The priority code of the [c][ffff00]Ghyst Command Card[-][/c] will [c][ffff00]silence the turrets[-][/c] and [c][ffff00]open the hangar doors[-][/c] for you. Please let me know when you need help with the escape.
You need to have the [c][ffff00]Ghyst Command Card[-][/c] in your inventory to unlock the hangar doors of the prison!

Convince the station AI of a required maintenance. Use the various [c][00ffff]station consoles[-][/c] and read what the station AI is saying. Look for the following keywords in the messages: [c][ffff00]Date of Activation[-][/c], [c][ffff00]Incompatibility errors[-][/c] and [c][ffff00]Polaris references. [-][/c]This might take several tries. \n[u]Keywords/sentence to look for:[/u] [c][fbff00]date of activation[-][/c]
[u]Keywords/sentence to look for:[/u] [c][ffff00]I keep finding [-][/c][c][fbff00]Polaris references[-][/c]
[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] We have them all! Now we need to find the [c][ffff00]CPU_Console[-][/c]. Take care. It will be guarded!
Use the elevator on the right side and go to the lowest level. Then straight ahead until you reach a [c][ffff00]red door[-][/c]. \nFrom there, follow the painted red corridors up to the Core.

[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] Use the elevator on the right side and go to the lowest level. Then straight ahead until you reach a [c][ffff00]red door[-][/c]. From there, follow the painted red corridors up to the Core.
[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] Access the console and follow its orders.
[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] To find the CORE, we first need to find the [c][ffff00]Quartermasters [-][/c]office.

Required: Destroy the CORE in order to complete the task.\nNot required/optional: You can also replace the CORE and capture the station that way. The turrets in the station will then combat remaining enemies - which might wreck some havoc.
Access the Station Console in the CORE room.
[[c][00ffff]Yarod[-][/c]] Well done, Commander. Replace the Core to claim the station, if you want. But then we should get out of here and report GLaD what we found!
[[c][00ffff]Palant[-][/c]] The container doors of the [c][ffff00]red containers [-][/c]just opened! Quick - we need to close them!
Is it normal that this does not set off an alarm?
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] Door lock removed! Attention, Commander. Mercer is not alone!
Have a seat in your cockpit
The self-destruction activator can be found in the room next to the upper landing pad.
[[c][00ffff]Mercer[-][/c]] The crew is evacuated, Commander! We'll meet on rally point alpha! Mercer out.

[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] Sending Ghyst priority code ... success! The hangar doors are unlocked, but we need to get rid of the turrets. [c][ffff00]Destroy them[-][/c] before entering the prison! Be prepared for surprises. The station is on alert!
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] The Prisoners are in the [c][ffff00]main cell block[-][/c]. Expect all sorts of traps and troops on your way.
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] The captives should be somewhere inside.
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] There should be a [c][ffff00]lever [-][/c]in the control room around the corner.

[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] Commander, I am afraid we have been locked out! We need to go to the [c][ffff00]COMMAND CENTER[-][/c] and use the main override. I managed to unlock the doors for our way there!
IDA, please call Hyzani. I have an idea.

[[c][00ffff]Captain[-][/c]] Commander, the prisoners are safe, but there is a swarm of Kriel coming to attack this position. You should leave.  Ambassador Hyzani wants to meet you on her ship as soon as you find the time.
The override access lever can be found on the wall of the main COMMAND CENTER.
IDA, please locate the converter and overload it the same moment I activate the override access
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] Commander, the captain of the rescue vessel is calling us.
[[c][00ffff]IDA[-][/c]] We need to return to the [c][ffff00]main corridor[-][/c] and find the way to the [c][ffff00]Cell Block Control[-][/c] room.
